jobDescription: The James J. Peters VA Medical CenterJoin the VA Team - Caring for our Veterans!The James J. Peters VA Medical Center, Bronx VAMC is affiliated with the Mt. Sinai School of Medicine (NYC), numerous Nursing Academic Affiliations and the Hospital for Special Surgery. Supervisory General Engineer (Maintenance and Operations)The James J. Peters Veterans Affairs Medical Center is seeking one (Full Time) Supervisory General Engineer to join the Maintenance and Operations Team. The ideal candidate will have a bachelors or Master’s degree in engineering, along with at least five (5) years of successful supervisory engineering practice- a minimum of 3 years of experience in a hospital setting.The tour of duty is Monday through Friday 8:00am, to 4:30pm. This position requires working some weekends, nights and holidays and on call as needed.U.S. Citizenship is required. A financial disclosure is not required for this position. To apply for this position, you must provide a complete Application Package via USA Jobs using the following link: https://www.usajobs.gov/GetJob/ViewDetails/501650900. In addition, a resume can be sent to the Human Resources Management Program at: Department of Veterans AffairsJames J.
